Events that occurred on 8 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 – J.R.R. Tolkien, out of action since late October, is repatriated and sent to a hospital in Birmingham.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing Letter 89.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 220a.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 280.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 330a.
2002 - The Fellowship of the Ring is released in the EU for Xbox, PC and Game Boy Advance.
2003 - The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring is released in North America.
2004 - David Salo's A Gateway to Sindarin is published.
2005 - The Lord of the Rings: Tactics is released in North America.
2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in Northern Europe.
2023 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Corsairs of Umbar is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by Voronwë, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon. They reach the Pools of Ivrin and see Túrin.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
